---
title: Mean Columnwise Root Mean Squared Error (MCRMSE)
description: A [metric](metric.qmd) used for those tasks where multiple targets need to be predicted. This metric simply takes the average of the [RMSE](root_mean_squared_error_rmse.qmd) of each target.
